# qiverse.qiplotly

<!-- badges: start -->

[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental) [![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/qiverse.qiplotly)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=qiverse.qiplotly)

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of qiverse.qiplotly is to provide a package ploting SPC and Funnel Plots in Plotly.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `qiverse.qiplotly`:

``` r
devtools::install_github("AUS-DOH-Safety-and-Quality/qiverse/qiverse.qiplotly")
```

Branches of the development version of `qiverse.qiplotly` can also be installed through the "ref" option:

``` r
devtools::install_github("AUS-DOH-Safety-and-Quality/qiverse/qiverse.qiplotly", ref = "branch-a")
```
